title: Bloomberg Businessweek Weekend - March 6th, 2020
itunes:title: Bloomberg Businessweek Weekend - March 6th, 2020
description:
Hosted by Carol Massar and Jason Kelly.

Featuring highlights from the latest issue of Bloomberg Businessweek:

-Global Markets go on a Roller Coaster Ride as the Corona Virus Spreads

-The Race for the Democratic Presidential Candidate Takes Shape

-Remembering Legendary CEO Jack Welch

-The Year of the Noodle in the Pursuits Section

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
